website_summaries.verdict: Best daytime solution to help reduce fine lines and brown spots.
pros: Devoted followers swear that daily use of this serum improved their skin within weeks
Numerous before and after photos show users with brighter, smoother and even colored skin
cons: 3-5 drops of this product should be applied before a cream

customer_reviews.title: Made skin worse
customer_reviews.text: I have a bad reaction everytime I use this product. I never breakout but every time I use this product my face itches bad and I get breakouts. I kept using it because I wasn’t sure but after some time I’m certain it’s from this product. I’ve read other reviews of people experiencing the same thing as well
customer_reviews.author: A.L

customer_reviews.title: My Second Bottle!
customer_reviews.text: I have combination skin type that can get quite dry during cold weather. I purchased this for my new skincare routine because I would sometimes get one or two deep pimples with my old "just face wash and moisturize" routine. Since I've included this in my revamped routine it has made a huge difference in how clear and consistent my skin has been. Just keep in mind that this isn't a miracle solution, you need to consider diet, activity, and then what you use on your face.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: I have just recently begun having really bad cystic acne and after the breakouts clear up, I'll have lots of dark marks. This product work wonders! I'm writing this review after my second purchase, so I will most certainly be keeping it in my beauty regimen. I recommend this product to anyone struggling with dark marks.
customer_reviews.author: DGrove

customer_reviews.title: Massive improvement
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I've used $80 products that haven't done as much as this serum. I suffer from red spots and persistent acne ( a result of hormones and bad genetics ) and i have tried so many products but this one not only hydrated my skin but also evened my skin tone. I've been using it for a week and have already seen improvement. I suggest trying this if you have drier skin, if you have painful deep acne, or if you have annoying red spots.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Costley

customer_reviews.title: Little lumpy but it’s working
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for abt 2 weeks and I actually can see difference on my acne scars. The scars are not gone but it’s a lot lighter using this. Only thing I don’t like is the product seemed to crystallize. I have to pick out the little dots after I apply it. Not sure if that’s what is it but my serum is not smooth liquid. I feel little lumps/bumps in them. Anyways, I would recommend this product to help speed up the dark spot fading process. I’ll update again after my bottle is finished.
customer_reviews.author: LadyA

customer_reviews.title: Skin feels soft but product peels right off
customer_reviews.text: At first I really liked this product. It sincerely made my skin feel like a dream and I was hoping to see lasting results! But about a week in, I realized that this product makes it FEEL like my skin is smoother but its not actually being absorbed and making a healing difference in my wrinkles and pores. It's more just sitting on top of my skin and filling in lines. If I apply and wait 5 mins, i can actually rub and peel it off in dry patches. Definitely unhappy with this.
customer_reviews.author: CatLady4LIFE

customer_reviews.title: this stuff works
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this after reading a review on Rank & Style. I didn't notice any overt changes for about 8 days--and then I noticed how smooth my skin was. I have been battling peri-menopause rough skin for about a year. Now it is lovely and soft. I also ordered the Vit C moisturizer, and I use them together. Also, the customer service is exceptional. Erica is the woman who reached out to me and she is very quick to respond, and pleasant. In today's world, to find a product that works AND is a great price AND has wonderful employees is a fantastic thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product; Wonderful Company
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through so many different skin care products, and they always seem to fall short of their claims. I absolutely love the TruSkin Naturals serum I received. My only regret is not going for the larger size, but definitely next time! I have recommended this product to my friends, as it has already evened my skin tone and marginalized my pores. Not only was the product better than expected, the company reached out to me shortly after I started using it to make sure I was happy with it. I would give them 10 stars, if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service; Ineffective
customer_reviews.text: Revising initial review for excellent customer service, as seller reached out directly and was willing to provide assistance in identifying alternative product for skin type. Purchased along with toner to manage dry skin. My skin has become increasingly dry since beginning use, and is now flaky.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: This is my second bottle. Can’t say that I’ve ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bottle. Can’t say that I’ve noticed much of a difference in my hyperpigmentation but there is some... will see what happens.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: Great for dark spots! I wish I had taken a before and after picture. Helps a little with acne too, but I think I’ll try the tea tree serum for that next. I use every night and morning and I could tell a difference in my dark spots within a week. On the days I use a derma roller, I’ll put the serum on right after and it stings, but the next day I’ll wake up looking like a celebrity! Will highly recommended to anyone suffering from dark spots.
customer_reviews.author: Jas

customer_reviews.title: A+++! Great Product and Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the products two weeks now. I do believe I am seeing results! I mix the R and C for morning use under my moisturizer and makeup. I use the HA after removing my makeup at night and apply also to my lips. I actually think some of the creases around my lips are less severe, the lips are plumper, and my neck seems a bit less saggy.
customer_reviews.author: Margery - Texas

customer_reviews.title: Also the Co-Founder named Erica is super helpful with any questions or concerns you may have
customer_reviews.text: I just want to say that I have really seen results in only just two weeks! My acne has become less occurrent and my acne scars have become less visible. Skin is also looking brighter. Also the Co-Founder named Erica is super helpful with any questions or concerns you may have. She'll send you an email right after purchase to insure that there is an actual human behind all of this haha. She is super fast at responding to emails if you do decide to email her anything. So far I am LOVING the product. I've tried other serums and this one just doesn't compare. I'm sure I will continue to see results.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Great Serum. I’m in Love!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this serum for about a week consistently as directed. I did a skin test initially with zero reaction to the ingredients. So far I have noticed brighter and even skin tone. The serum does not feel sticky and actually feels quite good on my face, neck and décolletage. It’s afforable and my new favorite serum. Works great for me. I look forward to continued use and other products on their line.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi N

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. My skin is more on the dry type and since I started using this product about 3 months ago I have noticed a significant improvement. Not only my skin feel less dry, but it’s also improved my complexion. I use this every morning after I use toner on my face and under moisturizer and make up. At night after I clean my face I put this on again and use it as a night cream. I like this product because it doesn’t feel oily on my face and it soothes my skin too.
customer_reviews.author: Atni Davis

customer_reviews.title: ... online and ultimately chose this one because of its great reviews. I unfortunately did not experience the results ...
customer_reviews.text: I spent a lot of time reviewing Vitamin C products online and ultimately chose this one because of its great reviews. I unfortunately did not experience the results others raved about. I broke out after using this product but kept going because I thought it was just clearing my pores. The breakouts were temporary but, I just didn't see any noticeable difference in my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Feels great!
customer_reviews.text: I am really liking this serum. It feels very nice on my skin with no irritation. I also use the cleanser and moisturizer and the trio makes for a very effective beauty regime. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sally L.

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: For the first few time I apply it, I could see slight improvement on my skin. However, after about fourth time, I started to notice there is no improvement whatsoever. And now it has zero effect. I think this product is probably not for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: A Good Samaritan

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy! Scam!
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work!😡 I have been trying to send the item I bought because it does not work. It is sticky and stinky. When I sent the photo of my order a lady replied that it wasn’t their product! I’m very disappointed 😡 this is a scam! I don’t recommend this product to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Helen Mercurio

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I think it is very good product. I have extremely delicate skin but I had no problem with this product. I just wish for the nicer smell. I like when my cosmetics smell nice. I guess than it wouldn't be all natural, organic etc.
customer_reviews.author: Sylwia S.

customer_reviews.title: ... about a week ago and so far I do like it because I have very dry skin and every ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got it about a week ago and so far I do like it because I have very dry skin and every moisturizer out there is oil free unless you use a serum which I was but still wasn't good enough and someone told me about vitamin C serum So I decided to try it. I'm happy so far! Not to mention I have wasted over $400.00 on clinique products that were suppose to lighten dark spots but dd absolutely nothing for me just a waste of time and a lot of money.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it's weight in gold!! 🥇😊
customer_reviews.text: I'm loving the TruSkin Naturals Vitamin C serum. On the nights I'm not using Tretinoin cream and hydroquinone, I apply the TruSkin Vitamin C instead. It's a great addition to my nightly anti aging skin regiment. Thanks for the great product.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Dumeng Rosado

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results!
customer_reviews.text: I must say, I am very happy with the results of the vitamin C serum. I use it 1-2 times a day which is included in my daily routine when getting ready. My skin is noticeably more radiant, and a lot more alive looking! Not only is the product amazing, the follow up on their customer service side is just as rewarding! Thank you truskin! You have added a new member to your family!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashworth Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Stacky , Mediocer serum.
customer_reviews.text: The feeling : stacky, kind of dry. The result : light rash all over my face. give me rough skin, little bumpy skin after 1 week.
customer_reviews.author: mickey

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Save your money. Sticky and made me break out in red bumps.No improvement! Cheap skincare line
customer_reviews.author: BigCyn1

customer_reviews.title: it seems like my tone has evened out some
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using this serum for a few weeks, but I do notice a subtle change in my skin...it seems like my tone has evened out some. And the laugh lines around my eyes aren't as pronounced! Plus it feels really good putting on at night after a long, hard day :)) The company is really great and they respond to any and all your questions! The best customer service I've ever experienced online!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: itchy on face. broke and scarred my face. ...
customer_reviews.text: itchy on face. broke and scarred my face. until now i am getting rid of the cyst. never had those until i used this. had to throw it out. smells unnatural too.
customer_reviews.author: erbias

customer_reviews.title: Finally, something that doesn't make me break out!!
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to use, my skin isn't dry anymore, and my skin tone is evening out (including my under eye circles and acne scarring). It also seems to be helping with making my foundation stay longer; likely because my skin isn't as dry, and therefore, less oily. And on top of all that, my skin isn't breaking out - and for anybody with cystic acne, you know that can be a HUGE deal. I love this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it!!!! I have been using it for a little bit more than a month and I can see the difference. Everything takes time, but I have seen that my face looks radiant than before. I have oily skin and I still suffer from breakthroughs so every time I get one , using the C serum they go away faster than usual. Also , the costumer service is amazing. I used to use truth c serum fro Olehenriksen, but definitely trueSkin C serum is m7ch better. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karla E.

customer_reviews.title: Love this serum
customer_reviews.text: Love this serum. I use it day and night after washing my face. This is my 3rd bottle and I won’t ever be without it. Brightens and keeps my skin looking fresh without being sticky or greasy.
customer_reviews.author: MaryAnn

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I am so excited to find a product that actually works and at a reasonable price point! I am absolutely loving the product! I had tried many different brands and had actually gone to making my own in my kitchen(former chemistry major, can you tell?). But now I no longer have to! Just do me a big favor...don't change the formulation. It's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara H

customer_reviews.title: I have used many vitamin c products with great results. This isn’t one of them
customer_reviews.text: This didn’t break me out, but I couldn’t really tell that it did anything beneficial. I have used many vitamin c products with great results. This isn’t one of them.
customer_reviews.author: Josette McConville

customer_reviews.title: Best !
customer_reviews.text: Have bought atleast 4-5 bottles for use. It is the best vitamin C serum for the price and believe me i have tried many and more expensive ones.
customer_reviews.author: Hurman

customer_reviews.title: Had a funny smell once opened
customer_reviews.text: Had a funny smell once opened. Like sour almost. I tried it and it started to immediately irritate my skin. I had to wash it off. And still I have a chemical burn on my cheeks and chin now. 😭😩
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Attn seller! Received 3/4 empty!!
customer_reviews.text: Just opened my bottle since my last bottle just finished and it was 3/4 already gone! Seal was on, but barely enough inside to get a couple days if that of use. If the seller is reading this, and I hope They are, please make this right. I’m a loyal customer and love the product. Just not enough to risk buying another empty bottle
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lersch

customer_reviews.title: A little sticky
customer_reviews.text: This product was all around okay. I used it for about a month and saw no difference in my face’s redness. I did experience smother skin but after the serum would dry it would leave a sticky film on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Lima

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Start!!
customer_reviews.text: I am liking the Vitamin C serum. It absorbs quickly and there is no tackiness left behind and it wears well under my make-up (no pilling). I have seen some slight improvement in clarity, but have only been using for a couple of weeks and I realize these benefits can take time. Being that I am 54 years old, improvements on older skin can take longer to realize then others. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon E Gray

customer_reviews.title: Results
customer_reviews.text: This product has reduce my hyperpigmentation. I've used it daily for 3 months and saw results after 6 weeks. I also use the truskin daily lotion
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wish I'd started sooner!
customer_reviews.text: My skin feels firmer and looks brighter/more even after a week and a half. I'm excited to keep using this product. The seller was also really helpful when I had a few questions about using this serum. She replied to my email within two hours.
customer_reviews.author: Ann McIntosh

customer_reviews.title: I love the product
customer_reviews.text: I love the product. I bought one for my mom as well and she loves it too. We were trying to find something similar to Rodan and Fields serum and we like this one way more that Rodan and Fields. My skin is so soft and it has helped with the dryness from winter.
customer_reviews.author: Krj77

customer_reviews.title: This is my 5th bottle I was really satisfied with it The last bottle was totally different
customer_reviews.text: This is my 5th bottle I was really satisfied with it The last bottle was totally different !! Different color, smell and feeling I don't know maybe fake or spoiled Not sure if I will buy this again I have to search for new vitamin c serum😞
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New go to
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended to me by a coworker. i was originally going to buy one from Sephora that cost over $50 and im glad i went with this one. after using three of the products together with my regular cleanser my face is blemish free after about four days, no flakes, or dryness, the redness a reduced significantly and my scaring a fading every day.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic products & great customer service!.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic products, great customer service and fast delivery. I use several different TruSkin products and I can't say enough great things about them except that my skin, and eyes, look fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: CherylShopping

customer_reviews.title: Very Fast Shipping
customer_reviews.text: My package with my TruSkin Toner, serum and moisturizer was securely packaged and I received the products very quickly. Three days into using the product and my first day back to work after the weekend and the girls said my skin looks really glowy and bright for some reason. It's more than just coincidence!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I must say this is def working great for me and it’s been about two weeks I’ve ...
customer_reviews.text: I must say this is def working great for me and it’s been about two weeks I’ve used it by itself, along with derma rolling and with a microdermabrasion tool. It’s done my face wonders!! By itself it has helped shrink my pores and everywhere I go everyone keeps mentioning how I have a glow to me lol which at first I was like omg am I pregnant lol 😂 but no it’s definitely this serum... thanks so much for this product I definitely will be buying again!!
customer_reviews.author: Carm

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for 3 months to fade dark spots on my cheeks and reduce bags under my eyes. I've noticed a dramatic difference. Dark spots have faded and bags are not as noticeable. I love this product!
customer_reviews.author: T. J.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product. I use under eyes before applying eye gel from this same vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: FAIL.
customer_reviews.text: After reading all of the good reviews, I really hoped this product would help correct dark spots and hyper-pigmentation on my face caused by acne...instead it did nothing but make my face dry and sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Fan for life now
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! My skin has never looked better.
customer_reviews.author: Serenity19

customer_reviews.title: This Product is so Good!
customer_reviews.text: So, I’ve been dealing with bad skin lately. It’s new to me & I’m 31. I am using 3 products from Amazon at the same time. This serum, retinol creme & the cleanser by instaNatural. I am amazed. I’m sure the TruSkin is playing a huge role in my NEW SKIN! Can’t wait to upload my before /after results for you guys. GET THIS PRODUCT SOON.
customer_reviews.author: Lateasha Smith

customer_reviews.title: I love this Vitamin C serum!!
customer_reviews.text: I am 53 and have been using TruSkin Naturals Vitamin C serum for over a year and have noticed an improvement in the integrity of my skin. It absorbs quickly and gives my face a nice glow. I definitely notice a difference when I stop using it! I have since added the HA serum for a nice anti-aging one-two punch! I love this stuff!!
customer_reviews.author: R. S.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice feel and hydrating
customer_reviews.text: Actually like this syrum. Seems to be helping my eye area quite well. I have been using for 4 months and I am in my mid 50s
customer_reviews.author: Ki

customer_reviews.title: It’s fine, but it dries really quickly and leaves an ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s fine, but it dries really quickly and leaves an odd texture on your face. I don’t think I will purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Hamster Girl

customer_reviews.title: A definite keeper!
customer_reviews.text: I have found this serum to be incredibly effective for mature (40+) skin. I can see and feel the difference in just a short time. Skin feels softer, smoother and appears healthier overall. Does not clog pores or cause breakouts for me. Especially effective after micro needling, but I use it without micro needling as well. I have recently purchased my second bottle and will be repurchasing again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: DGH

customer_reviews.title: My fine lines are also less noticeable
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of this serum. It moisturizes my skin and shrinks my pores a bit. My fine lines are also less noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Usage Details
customer_reviews.text: This product i did not see much results. The only result i saw is that it did brighten up my skin and make my acne dark spots lighter. But overall i did not see any difference in my fine line and wrinkles, i used this product every day for 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Great serum!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this purchase! My skin looks lot better now. I'm 32 years old and had adult acne problems. I barely see acne's in my face.. my skin type no more oily in my cheeks and pores are also closed.
customer_reviews.author: Vidi

customer_reviews.title: My face is so soft!
customer_reviews.text: This product goes on very smooth, less is more! Ive noticed in 2 weeks my skin is softer and its easier to apply my makeup! Will definitely be reordering.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great Serum! My skin looks better after a month.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product back in October, and I have been consistently using it ever since. I am 21, and have good skin, but this product helps my skin look brighter and has improved my overall condition of my skin. I use it in the morning and at night after my toner, before my moisturizer.

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: I can see the effect in one or two weeks. But gone quickly. Ready to buy the second bottle now.

customer_reviews.text: Very, very, good product. I have been using this serum for a week and am very pleased.

customer_reviews.text: I don't understand the great reviews, caused little pimples beneath the skin.

customer_reviews.text: I can already tell it's working. I use this along with my roller. I've only used it for 2 days and I can feel my skin tightening.

customer_reviews.title: Fast & noticable results
customer_reviews.text: I have been pleased with the combination of retinol and vitamin C Serums. My skin is smoother, less blotchy, and what acne I do have occasionally has all but disappeared. Only put 4 stars because I haven't had a chance to see if long term use will bring more results, but the results I've seen so far were evident within a week of use.
customer_reviews.author: Laura W.

customer_reviews.title: Holy grail!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I've had a problem with moderate to severe cystic acne for many years. After using this product for 5 days, my acne has decreased dramatically and my scarring and pigmentation has greatly diminished! Please don't ever discontinue this product! It's my holy grail!

customer_reviews.text: Very nice vitamin C serum. Good price. Easy and pleasant to use. Do not know however if my skin looks better.

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This serum tightens and tones the skin, I can see a huge difference in the tone/texture of my skin and fine lines. I see the biggest difference in the skin on my neck.

customer_reviews.title: She is very happy with this product

customer_reviews.title: I love it! and will definitely be ordering it again
customer_reviews.text: I have really sensitive skin and have had no problems with breakouts using this product. I love it! and will definitely be ordering it again.

customer_reviews.title: Love the serum
customer_reviews.text: Love the serum. This is the second time I am getting it. Makes your skin bright and my face doesn't break out when I use it. I use it at nighttime and after 10 minutes apply the moisturizer.

customer_reviews.title: I will buy again
customer_reviews.text: This is the only serum that absorbs into my skin and its not watery like the others.

customer_reviews.title: This product is supposed to be clear but it is ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is supposed to be clear but it is yellowish and drys my skin out immediately. I am wondering if I received either a defective or out of date product.

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and it works !!

customer_reviews.author: Natalie Cardoza

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the product so far and will definitely be reordering and trying some of the other serums as well. The customer service team is also very professional and customer oriented, which also contributes to the positive experience with this company.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Kelly

customer_reviews.title: My face loves this!
customer_reviews.text: I get compliments on my skin all the time and I'm 39 years old! Love this product
customer_reviews.author: chrystal hedlin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Customer service was great. They refunded me without asking due to my allergic reaction to the product My skin did feel plump due to the hyaluronic acid but it burned my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Dondee Ganev

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I am using it faithfully before bed and ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I am using it faithfully before bed and like how it feels. I have sun spots that I hope it helps to fade. Great customer service!!
customer_reviews.author: Shauna

customer_reviews.title: I can see the difference in my skin after using ...
customer_reviews.text: I can see the difference in my skin after using this product. My sun spots in particular seem to have faded a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Pegnitz

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for about 2 weeks and have noticed a subtle difference. I'm sure my skin will continued to improve using it twice a day. I can't wait to try other products from the TruSkin line.
customer_reviews.author: Jyll A.

customer_reviews.title: but feels great in, so hoping in a few months to ...
customer_reviews.text: Does not seem to be working miracles just yet, but feels great in, so hoping in a few months to see results.

customer_reviews.title: I received this last night and so far I am ...
customer_reviews.text: I received this last night and so far I am a fan. There is no smell, slightly sticky when applying but that goes away after drying. TBD if it works.
customer_reviews.author: HEP27

customer_reviews.title: my face glows and is super soft. I do use a oil face wash ...
customer_reviews.text: Made a big difference in my skin , my face glows and is super soft . I do use a oil face wash and then apply the vitamin C , then a softner , then a moisturizer . But without the Vitamin C its not the same.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: I think the fine lines are less and it feels firmer
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the serum for a couple of weeks and I think it is working. My skin feels more even and less blotchy. I think the fine lines are less and it feels firmer. I have gotten a couple of compliments so i think that is a sign.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica B.

customer_reviews.title: The Product is great, I have been using it almost every day ...
customer_reviews.text: The Product is great, I have been using it almost every day and I am seeing a difference in the texture of my skin which is fantastic. I really love that there is no scent to it and it is super easy to use. Thank you for having such a great product for sale!

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: My skin has improved after using this product and I would order it again.

customer_reviews.text: I broke out after three weeks of using this. Won’t be repurchasing. Now to get my skin back to normal 😢

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I use this twice daily under my lotion. It had definitely made my skin brighter and tighter. Highly recommend!

customer_reviews.title: Your search ends here!!
customer_reviews.text: I am quite liking this product. So far good effects.. My pores r reduced n no more breakout.

product_meta.title: TruSkin Vitamin C Serum for Face with Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin E, Witch Hazel, 1 fl oz
product_meta.description:
Size:1 Fl. Oz

Who needs artificial fillers and harsh chemicals when you can achieve amazing results without them!

TruSkin Naturals is all about skin-friendly, ingredients

IMPORTANT - This plant based formula naturally ranges in color from almost clear to somewhat cloudy from batch to batch. TruSkin Naturals chooses not to hide these natural variations with artificial colors and synthetic stabilizers to ensure the formula is kept as pure as possible and because the appearance of the serum has no impact on the effectiveness of the formula.
feature_bullets: Advanced Antioxidant Serum - An indispensable nutrient for collagen production, vitamin C synergistically blends with Botanical Hyaluronic Acid and Vitamin E in this advanced formula designed to target the most common signs of aging including brightness, firmness, fine lines, wrinkles, dark spots & sun spots.

THE DIFFERENCE in skin treated with TruSkin Vitamin C Serum is striking. See thousands of reviews from real Amazon customers below rave about brighter, fresher looking skin, improved tone and clarity, smaller pores, less breakouts, fine lines and dark spots.

Plant Based Formulation - Free of synthetic color additives, fragrance, and stabilizers, dynamic active botanicals like Aloe Vera, MSM, Botanical Hyaluronic Acid, Witch Hazel and organic Jojoba oil combine in a silky smooth serum that can be used day or night.
Leaping Bunny certified CRUELTY FREE. Formulated and bottled in the USA.

EXTENDED MANUFACTURER GUARANTEE - Love it or your money back! We understand it can take some experimentation to find just the right product for your unique skincare needs. If for any reason you decide this product isn't a good fit for your skin, we offer a 90-day money-back refund. No questions asked (in fact, you don't even have to return the bottle).
